com.ninchat.master

Class SigningKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ninchat.master.SigningKey

  • public class SigningKey
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds a Ninchat master key, and knows how to create HMAC signatures for use with Ninchat API actions. The master key id and secret may be obtained with the create_master_key Ninchat API action. The masterKeySecretData passed to the constructor is binary data; it must have been base64-decoded beforehand.
    See Also:
    GsonActionSigning

    • Method Detail

      • makeNonce

        public java.lang.String makeNonce()
        This is a low-level utility. Use only when implementing an alternative for GsonActionSigning.
        Returns:
        a random token to be used as part of the signed JSON message.

      • sign

        public java.lang.String sign(long expire,
                             java.lang.String nonce,
                             byte[] msg)
                      throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                             java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        This is a low-level interface. Use only when implementing an alternative for GsonActionSigning.
        Parameters:
        expire - is seconds since 1970-01-01 UTC.
        nonce - was created with makeNonce().
        msg - is JSON-encoded text.
        Returns:
        a value suitable to be passed to the Ninchat API as the master_sign parameter.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
